column4: I want to love ubuntu, it is amazing, but it is little complications like this that make it a bloody nigthmare for a windows all his life user.
i'm one step away from putting windows 7 on my christmas wishlist.
lol, tbh the immense wealth of amazing programs keeps me hooked on ubuntu for the time being.
i'm coming to this late, but can you paste your interfaces file and put the url here?  not sure if I can help but i'll try...
